Yeah, well Dracona will just escape if she doesn't get reprogrammed, and
Sinesis and Sinister can reprogram her, because I have alot of important
stuff in store...
----- Original Message -----
From: <logomorph@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, July 21, 2000 5:09 PM
Subject: Re: Sorry.


> Hey Soulstice, Dracona may make it if she doens't tick off Megatron.
> Yeah, Beast Wars, Beast Machines, and Transformers in general. They
> are all cool.  I happen to be trying for my Vet degree in collage.
> But Tarantulas and scorpions are cool critters. DarkMouse will do
> what she can. But keep out of Megatron's way.  He's a lot meaner this
> time.) hehehe
>
>
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> > Logomorph? Oh! I get it, it sounds like Lagomorph! Clever. I got
> SOULSTICE
> > as my name (Thanks for calling me that) because that's what Hasbro
> was going
> > to call Windrazor but they changed it, so I got the name SOULSTICE
> instead.
> > I'm a Demuxe figure myself and can transform into a spider, a
> tarantula as a
> > matter of fact. I have 3 tarantulas, so you see that I like them
> alot. Got 2
> > scorpions as well. So you can see I love them, too. Yeah, arachnids
> are my
> > animal passion, so what? But my real passion lies in Beast Wars and
> the
> > greatest game ever, Final Fantasy 3! (6 in Japan) Yeah, I know my
> characters
> > are in tight spots, but as soon as Dracona gets reprogrammed I'll
> be back in
> > action...Hopefully...
> > ----- Original Message -----
